attributes.action: Merge MI5 and MI6 and all other counter terrorist departments to create one Counter Terrorist Unit (CTU)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the threat of international terrorism increasing everyday, Britain's counter terrorist departments are struggling to communicate with each other. With the creation of a single Counter Terrorism Unit (CTU) it will mean that all strike forces and anti terror operations will be spearheaded by one department, there will be one database for all suspected and known terrorists and their activities. Hopefully, this is a step towards a safer Britain.
